title: GetInventoryList
description: A query to retrieve a list of all available inventory items with their details.

filters.description: Optional filters to narrow down the inventory search.

category.description: Filter items by category (e.g., electronics, clothing, etc.).

location.description: Filter items by storage location or warehouse.

minStockLevel.description: Filter items with a stock level greater than or equal to this value.

inStock.description: Filter items that are currently in stock (true) or out of stock (false).

pageSize.description: The number of items per page.
